workflow_intent.title: Stochastic Entropic Cosmology Exploration
workflow_intent.objective: Investigate whether entropy-driven expansion models remain stable when perturbed under stochastic initial conditions.
workflow_intent.rationale: Waveframe v4.0 suggests horizon-entropy coupling may govern expansion. This workflow will evaluate robustness of the model under noise.

out_of_scope: observational data fitting beyond Type-Ia supernovae baseline

initial_assumptions: perturbations modeled as Gaussian noise ε(t) ~ N(0,σ²)

references: NTD v1.0.0 — epistemic rationale for transparency
